Title: I love this product
Body: We have 6 dots and 3 echo's . I love this product.

Title: Five Stars
Body: Perfect for the garage I have an echo in the house

Title: Awesome
Body: This is easily one of the coolest Product to have.

Title: Five Stars
Body: Great product for what we use it for. Highly recommended.

Title: Amazon is the best
Body: The best

Title: Not just an Echo
Body: She is an overachiever!

Title: Amazing!
Body: What an amazing little gadget! I was not 100% sure about the speaker quality with such a small form factor, but interesting enough it is GREAT! Love it, I just place an order for more ECHOS, it seems I can't get enough of them. Reliable, stylish, funtional, simply AWESOME!

Title: The mini is perfect Does the job just like the larger one only ...
Body: The mini is perfect  Does the job just like the larger one only smaller speaker  I like it so much  I purchased  five

Title: Nailed it for a whole house solution now!
Body: Yahoooo... now able to have one on each side of the bed and they don't get confused. (And we can have more than one so my spouse is not yelling over me at night to turn the lights out anymore either!!!!) I do miss the volume ring, but other than that, these new units knock it out of the park. I am now able to TALK to Alexa in every room in the house instead of yelling into the next room. Better yet, the front hall doesnt respond when Im talking in the kitchen.

Title: Works okay for shopping lists etc.
Body: Works okay for shopping lists etc.  Small and convenient BUT you must pair to speakers if you want to listen to music

Title: I love my Alexa
Body: I love my Alexa.  It's so great that I bought another one for my bedroom. I haven't had any problems with either one.

Title: Amazing Little Helper
Body: An amazing little device! Alexa is rather intelligent but does have a number of limitations. First, don't expect this to be the AI of your dreams. She can retrieve facts, play music and control devices, but she cannot differentiate one voice from another, or understand uncommon lingo, or carry on conversations, or take certain commands not related to information retrieval.But what she DOES do, she does well: She is a home-based assistant. She can give you hands-free access to important info that you may need or common features such as music, tv, timers, and recipes.The speaker on the Dot is far better than I expected. I was planning on hooking up a stereo to her in the kitchen, but it is really not needed. Music is clear and loud. I'm not sure if the only difference between this and the Echo is the speaker quality, but if it is, I really have no need for the Echo anymore.I still have lots of skills and features to explore, so this is just my review after a few days.

Title: Wave of the future or not? (Yes it is)
Body: The wave of the future. If you're into Technology, or are just a human that is lazy (smile) this item is for you. I'm just kidding about the lazy part. The reality is technology is amazing so why not have a product that can make your life a bit easier. Weather, house temperature, lights, music, ordering from Amazon, etc. this little device can do not all for you. Of course you have to buy your preferred smart equipment to use it in all its glory.

Title: Works like a charm
Body: This was our second Echo Dot. Worked just as well as the first.We've connected it to our A/V receiver and use it to stream audio through the stereo.Works like a charm, although the output could be a little stronger.Very happy with this unit thus far.

Title: Simply love it
Body: After having a few weeks now the echo has completed many tasks in the kitchen.  Everything from playing holiday music to weather updates.  The timer and alarm feature is also very helpful.  Actually is much more responsive than Siri who I think sleeps most of the day.

Title: ... Amazon Alexa this is my addiction that I totally love it just because it's connected to my Bluetooth speaker
Body: I already have Amazon Alexa this is my addiction that I totally love it just because it's connected to my Bluetooth speaker

Title: Five Stars
Body: good gift

Title: Five Stars
Body: I love my echo!

Title: Five Stars
Body: GR8

Body: Even my non tech husband loves it!

Title: Five Stars
Body: Love it so far.

Title: LOVE!
Body: Love it!

Title: Four Stars
Body: Way cool

Title: Five Stars
Body: Great product!

Title: Four Stars
Body: Great Purchase

Title: Five Stars
Body: Great Product!

Title: I am very happy with the product
Body: The reason why I'm writing this is because before purchasing I read some comments complaining about Alexa don't understanding what one say to her or repeating many times the instructions... I have tested my Echo Dot gen II with loud TV noises and high volume playing on it (without any external speakers) and with loud & clear commands she reacts most of the times.I am very happy with the product and with my experience so far... Highly recommended.

Title: Addition
Body: Disappointed in the sound quality!  If, your going to offer it in white then do the cord and plug in white as well.  The Dot has a definite use as an addition to the Epic and can be placed in small places.  I am using one in my bathroom attached to the wall for safety reasons.

Title: Five Stars
Body: She's funny, helpful, and knowledgeable!  Love using using alexa to play my music and listen to the news.

Title: Good not great
Body: A few questions it doesn't know the answer, can't play any type of music it tells you to upgrade to amazon music, You have to use the app on your phone to program certain information it should know. It's alright if you hook it up to smart gadgets around your house to make it easier and convenient for you.

Title: Fun to play with but not what I expected.
Body: I get a lot of 'I don't understand" I can't access that informaiton" can't access  my playlist and stops mid-song.

Title: I received this for Christmas and like the unit my brother has
Body: I received this for Christmas and like the unit my brother has, but I was personally disappointed in the lack of support for older Android phones.I own an Samsung SIII with the Android 4.0 ICS OS, but the Dot requires 4.4 KitKat and later.  With my current plan and phone, I don't have a need to upgrade and forcing me to buy a tablet or new phone is rather discouraging.  Aside from this, startup and function for the Dot seems good.

Title: Alexa is amazing!
Body: Works reasonably well for home lighting control. I have bothe Philips Hue and T-Link smart adapters controlling lighting on my house. Alexa is very impressive the way she can interpret commands and pick them out in a noisy room. She ever hears the Echo commercial commands on TV and try's to obey them.My only brag is that the Echo seems to loose connection to the hue bridge and I have to remove and reinstall the Hue skill to get it back.

Title: I am disappointed that it doesnt answer more questions
Body: I am disappointed that it doesnt answer more questions. We asked some very basic questions like what was the Dow Jones Industrial average today and it couldnt answer it. It is good with current news report, timer and playing music. You do have to connect it to another speaker in your home if you want the music to sound good. More complete instructions on making your home a smart home with Alexa would be nice. The price was good and it is fun.

Title: I'm glad i got it on sale for 39
Body: I'm glad i got it on sale for 39. that's the right price point in my opinion. It has a ways to go for things it can do. I do like it a lot though. Sound is plenty fine as is. I did connect it wirelessly to a small speaker, and that's really nice. The speaker I got also has a microphone so effectively I have a second Alexa. My echo dot can be in one room, and my speaker in another room far away and I can use that 25 dollar speaker as the echo.

Title: I love Alexa!
Body: This device is amazing, and I only have one complaint, and that is that if you ask this a simple question (ex: "When was the first Mackintosh released?") Alexa will not give you the answer, but instead send you a Bing results link in the Alexa app. Other than that I love it! I would recommend this device to anybody. It's great waking up to a virtual assistant, and being able to turn on my lights and give me info, and what's happening.

Title: love it,
Body: Love it!!!!  Have an cylinder echo in the main room, and this in my studio.  I can listen to music, books, set alarms and timers.

Title: Love Alexa
Body: Great for our bedroom ... use it mainly to control the lights.  Have the regular Alexa/Echo also.  I'm an Echo fan.

Title: AMAZING !!!!
Body: What can I say that hasn't been said this thing is amazing, it's my new best friend the possibilities are endless. I love learning new things and my flash briefings really helps kick start my day, very positive and motivational which is a lovely way to start my day.

Title: Mine prefers  to b called "ALEXA"
Body: Well, she really is cool. Great Timer. An Awsome Speaker. Mine liked her name to be "Alexa" rather than "Echo". Sometimes she had a BAD hearing problem.

Title: ... connect to another bluetooth speaker to get it louder disappointed in
Body: speaker is way to low i shouldnt have to connect to another bluetooth speaker to get it louder disappointed in this

Title: The Echo Dot has been a terrific addition to the house
Body: The Echo Dot has been a terrific addition to the house. Alexa is responsive and accurate in replying to requests for information, news and music.

Title: Bought it for my husband who plays classical music for ...
Body: Bought it for my husband who plays classical music for my pup and for him all day. It was to replace our dying iPad w/ the Pandora App. I also bought him a Bose speaker to connect via bluetooth. Alexa is also very helpful with our questions, demands, and the music doesn't suddenly stop, as on Pandora Free App, after 2 hours, it asks if you're "still listening." She continues until you tell her to, "Alexa Stop," or "Off."

Title: I like it, however mine will cut in and out ...
Body: I like it, however mine will cut in and out on music and does not respond at all times.  My friends have it and love it.  I think I just got one with some issues.  I'm exchanging mine for another.

Title: Really Helpful.
Body: It's a great start to something much bigger. It's been really convenient to just ask for information, instead of stopping everything to find your phone or computer. It's not perfect but it's getting better all the time, and if I had the money I would have one in every room.

Title: Love the Dot
Body: Does all I thought it would, but sometimes have difficulty pairing cheap $20 Bluetooth speaker... Have to use the phone app to do it, but everything else is just like my echo. I knew the speaker is minimal in the dot, but is good enough for my daughter to play her sleep music with no external speaker.  I wish the battery you can buy to make it "mobile" wasn't almost as much as the dot but I'm nitpicking.  I highly recommend the dot!!

Title: Five Stars
Body: Awesome gift

Title: Five Stars
Body: Fast Delivery and Loved the Item :) two thumbs up...

Title: My Mom loves it!
Body: Purchased for my mom for Christmas and she LOVES it.

Title: Four Stars
Body: Works fine I thought more music was included with it

Title: Four Stars
Body: Just as advertised

Title: Alexa is my friend
Body: Easy setup. Works like a champ.

Title: Five Stars
Body: Great

Title: Five Stars
Body: Great deal!

Title: Love this!
Body: Set it up in mind minutes. Love this!

Title: Three Stars
Body: Disconnects a lot

Title: WI, WI, FI
Body: I TRIED FOR A LONG TIME TO WORK AND LOAD, HOWEVER, THEY WOULD NEVER ACCEPT WIFI. ALL MY OTHER WIFI WAS WORKING GOOD, WHO KNOWS WHAT IT WAS

Title: I've only added a few skills so far but it works like a charm
Body: Got it today and have it up and running.  I've only added a few skills so far but it works like a charm. It controls my LIFX light too.

Title: Great voice control, but lacking.
Body: Az a disabled Veteran I love using the Dot. There is a learning curve to the commands. It's lacking in the natural language processing and searching like is available with Hound and Google. Alexa requires some odd commands to initiate the skills. I would be nicer to have the Skills invisible to the user and make Alexa use Skills like the utter! personal assistant. Speaking of personal assistants, Alexa is pretty much silent until spoken to.

Title: Couple Adopts New "Baby"
Body: We have named our new "baby" Echo and we are delighted with it!  "She" is far more chatty than I would have expected.  Our home is filled with the marches we love and the Big Band sounds we enjoy.  It is great background sound whenever we have coffee guests.  If we have guests for a meal we ask for 'dinner party music' and Echo obliges.  It is amazing that Echo recognizes our voices.  "She" makes us giggle sometimes.

Title: Expected Better
Body: I was expect a lot better when i asked for this for christmas. The dot doesnt hear very well and i feel like im yelling at a child to do something. Also half the time when im standing right next to it the thing will not either not understand me or just plan ignore me. I can see the benefits of it but it isnt something i would recommend to anyone. I wanted something easy to use- not something that half of my neighbors can hear me yelling at.

Title: Echo is the future.
Body: Alexa is my new best friend. Her AI needs some touching up, as she'll sometimes say she isn't able to find extremely specific things that I didn't even ask for (which leads me to believe that she totally was able to find them), and you can't really talk trash about her when she's nearby because she picks up on it immediately, but she's a quality product with great integration with a lot of the services I regularly use, like Google Calendar.

Title: Very Useful!
Body: I really enjoy the Echo Dot. Initially I wanted this for the alarm because I couldnt use my phone anymore but I use a lot of the functions on it, mainly the speaker. I buy so much music on Amazon Music just to listen to it on my dot and its much more convenient for me than Itunes. I also love the white noise skill and that Alexa tells jokes. Overall, I would reccommend it depending if you're gonna get use out of a majority of its functions.

Title: Very cool and handy.
Body: Product works great. Voice control is very handy for turning my hue lights on and off. Worth the money.

Title: I don't find it entirely useful. Its more of a party favor when guests ...
Body: I don't find it entirely useful. Its more of a party favor when guests are over, They like the novelty of it then everyone quickly moves on. Watch out, though; I have accidently ordered fishing hooks on it before, and I don't even fish! Luckily, it was only an $8 accidental purchase. Needless to say, I turned off the ability to order through it before a big accidental purchase was made. I bought mine at $29.99, and for the novelty, it's a fair price. â€‹

Title: Team echo
Body: I love my Alexa. I purchased the dot because my family took over the Alexa echo. For me the dot is perfect. Speaker sounds fine to me. I used the voice training on the app and now she hears me better and responds better. I have never had an issue with either of my echos.

Title: I think I will keep her.
Body: I am learning and it is learning too.  SHE does the basics well.  Weather,  time, music,  volume,  and short wikipedia explanations.I am having a bit of trouble with more advanced features, but that might be my fault.I will keep you updated with "our" progress.

Title: Okay for an Amazon vet
Body: I was very excited to receive it, but it's a little quirky just like Alexa.  Sometimes Echo does not understand me or is unable to assist with my request.  It's not a bad purchase if you love all things Amazon (like me), but I wouldn't recommend purchasing for a newbie.  The quirkiness can be a bit frustrating.  I have Alexa in my living room and Echo Dot in my bedroom with a bluetooth speaker to listen to my Amazon music.  She serves this purpose very well.

Title: So far I love the echo
Body: So far I love the echo.  I have yet to fully program my echo but the family is truly enjoying having it in the house.  Every morning you can hear what the weather is going to be and I enjoy getting my morning joke.  I will purchasing the lights that echo controls.

Title: Be Ready to Reconnect Devices All the Time
Body: Between dropping connectivity with bluetooth speaker, TP-LINK Smart Plug, and not recognizing WIFI setup, it seems we are constantly trying to update the Echo which is very frustrating.  It literally is connected to the TP link and a speaker and it is always dropping those two items, one of which was recommended by Amazon to work with the Echo (TP-LINK).  When it works, it seems to be a great device. Problem is it seldom works when needed.

Title: For the price, just do it! It's fun!
Body: I've had this for about 2 weeks and it's going great. Sometimes I forget to use it but when I do need something it's great. About 80% i use it to play music. I'll say "Alexa, play me something fun to get ready to" or "Alexa play something nice I can go to bed to" and she does it! Adding Lyft and Uber to it are great as well. There's still a lot I haven't figured it can do but for the price, I feel like I kinda have a Smart House.

Title: Despite having the capability for multiple accounts, the Calendars function is only suited for one user.
Body: The dot seems to really be catered to single users. Despite having two amazon acccounts for my wife and I, both added to Alexa under the "household" feature, we are unable to use our individual google calendars. The Alexa software will only allow you to specify a single calendar to which events are added. Regardless of which household account is active, events will only go to this one calendar. Changing the specified calendar changes the setting for both user accounts, making it impossible for me to add events to my calender, if she is to be able to add them to hers (or vice versa).I do not understand the purpose of the shared "household" accounts, when features I wish to be separated by account are shared (calendars feature), and features I wish were shared are separated (access to prime music).Two stars for the impressive microphone that doesn't miss a soft voice from across the room, but minus three for being multi-user unfriendly.

Title: Fun with Alexa
Body: Just started using it. Simple to set up and fun to ask Alexa questions. The only down side so far is that I thought it had a battery in it and could be mobile but it isn't. It needs to stay plugged in and in one spot if you're going to use it. Still like it, though!

Title: Love this addition to my home
Body: Have an echo and also now a dot in the bedroom. No more need to either go to where the echo is to turn off lights or other functions as the two pared perfectly and with no problems. Love this addition to my home.

Title: Love this. Works so well with everything in my ...
Body: Love this. Works so well with everything in my house. We just added a home automation system and the Dot connected and work easily.

Title: Echo Dot is a great fit on my desktop
Body: I hesitated to buy the Echo when it debuted, and I'm happy that I did.  The Echo Dot is a great fit on my desktop.  It is small and delivers big.  I ask Alexa for music, and I get music.  I ask Alexa for news, and I get all the news I want.  I ask Alexa to play meditation, and I get meditation background.  It's much better than having someone in the room arrange these things for me, and allows me the freedom to set once and use on demand.

Title: Awesome Product
Body: This poor thing is my slave!! tells me the news, adds things to my shopping list adds reminders to my calendar, plays music etc and never gets upset with me for being so demanding =) Originally bought the echo and found I couldn't attach a Bluetooth speaker to it besides the one built in so wasn't as portable as I wished for so I also purchased this and the remote so I can use my echo from outside with a Bluetooth speaker.

Title: Alexa is so cool
Body: So cool. Alexa is just adorable... So useful...

Title: Two Stars

Title: One Star
Body: I hate it not what I thought it would be

Title: Electronics for young and old.
Body: This little unit sits almost invisible in my home. It's so neat how easily Alexa helps me keep organized, safe, and informed. Over time it will only get better. One of the best electronics decisions I'very made.

Title: Gen2 drops from Wi-Fi
Body: Gen 1 stays on the Internet all the time, no issues. This one is constantly dropping from the Wi-Fi connection, disappointing.

Title: Anyone interested in seeing what the fuss is about, should get one.
Body: I have this connected to a bluetooth speaker and I mainly use it for music and shopping lists but also to control my thermostats.It's really as useful for getting answers to questions as you might think. It's pretty dumb and still has a long ways to go before it lives up to Amazon's hype.It's inexpensive at $50 and it comes up at $40 some days and anyone interested in seeing what the fuss is about, should get one.

Title: Great little companion
Body: Great little product! Bought it as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend. It was very easy to get set-up and we were able to play with it for hours. Seems to be very user friendly and fun to use. He has it set-up on his desk at work and uses it everyday to play music, check the weather, and play jeopardy. The Dot has many other uses as well, but those are his favorite. Would highly recommend for anyone who likes gadgets and technology gifts.

Title: who thought this was a good idea. The speaker is so so
Body: I bought this one for myself.....others I gave as gifts. AT first I thought it was just a speaker but its a mini version. Works very well being tucked away out of sight in my formal living room. I dont care for the fact that its white with a black cord....who thought this was a good idea. The speaker is so so....I say go ahead and get the full version. Unless if you are like me and want it for a room were you want it hidden out of sight.

Title: Cool idea. I like to use for Amazon music
Body: Cool idea. I like to use for Amazon music. I wish it was more than a Bluetooth speaker and spoke with PC better though

Title: So far it's a novelty- hoping to find more utility.
Body: So far, it seems ok I guess. Not sure what I really expected other than it seems like having Siri on standby in the room. I suppose it's now about figuring out how best to use it.  So far it doesn't seem as capable of answering the same type of inquiries I use with Siri and it's too bad it doesn't interact better with common computer apps- like how Siri works on the new Mac OS.Maybe I'll like it more as I find more utility with it.

Title: Okay for the money, but better spent elsewhere.
Body: Its vastly inferior to Google Home, does not support Apple Music.  It crashes randomly and the "skills" are generally useless.

Title: Sound quality of the headphone jack is poor.
Body: I was hoping the headphone jack would sound decent so I could use it to drive a home stereo.  The sound quality is poor.  Comparing this against the headphone output of a Nexus 5x, the Echo Dot sounds considerably worse.Note that I'm not expecting it to sound as good as a CD player or anything like that.  I was just hoping it would sound as good as a phone headphone jack, which I think is a fair expectation, and it was not met.

Title: Works great as a smart home hub
Body: Pretty great. We mainly use this for home automation. Two drawbacks are having to repeat a command because Alexa says she does something but actually doesn't(turning off lights). And location. Kinda limited being corded. So the best place for her is our entertainment center. However she can't hear over our tv. So we either have to shout or find the remote to mute and then communicate with her. Not horrible problems but just some irritations.

Title: great buy
Body: love the dot so helpful!

Title: Five Stars
Body: Use this for everything.

Title: Five Stars
Body: Love the echo dot

Title: Awesome living room product
Body: Excellent product.  The voice recognition is awesome.  It picks my voice from another room.  I use it check weather, news, sports update, listen to local radio stations.  I'm sure it has lot more uses that I haven't explored yet.  Excellent budget product from Amazon.

Title: Great addition to echo but horrible sound
Body: Love my echo and the dot is great but I had to take two stars away because the sound quality when compared to the echo is just awful. It has a tin can sound to it and HAS to be used with another speaker system . I guess I'm spoiled with my echos sound quality.

Title: I am very disappointed with the overall response to most of my questions
Body: I am very disappointed with the overall response to most of my questions. "I don't understand....' or 'I cannot find the answer...'. Exact questions my friend asked on his phone and got an answer immediately. Seems your Echo Dot is very limited.  Bob Morel

Title: Artificial Intelligence done right!
Body: Being in the technology field and I had very high expectations for this device and wow did it delivery! Amazing artificial intelligence learning from Alexa... Also very useful with my smart home devices. Can't wait to get more devices for the rest of my house.

Title: Doesn't even compare to the full size Echo
Body: Really expected something that would respond as well as my full size Echo. I didn't expect it to sound as good (lacking the large speaker). But the "dot" only hears about 1 out of 10 commands. It will awaken and listen but then just goes back to sleep. Seriously disappointing after being so impressed with my full size Echo. I wouldn't recommend it. If you really want the functionality spend the extra money and get the big one.

Title: Live the Echo Dot. My three year old loves ...
Body: Live the Echo Dot. My three year old loves playing with also. Just need more products to pair with it. I will be buying another one.

Title: Just makes life easier
Body: Just purchased my 3rd Dot.....love them and use them in two of my homes as well as hue lighting, nest thermostat, and to-lunch switch.

Title: Fun but not very accurate
Body: For the most part it doesn't understand what I ask it.  It tells me all the time, "I'm sorry, I didn't understand the question."  Um, I asked, "What time do the West Virginia University Mountaineers play football today?"  I can't really think of any other way to ask that.  Also, I thought it would play my music I've purchased off Amazon but when I ask for a specific album by a specific artist, it tells me it can't find it.

Title: Best decision I could have made
Body: Traveling a lot I didn't want to pack up my echo, so I decided to purchase the Dot. Best decision I could have made. I'm a photographer and need music and info all the time..Paired with amazon music it's a win win combo!! The Echo at home and the Dot in the road..PERFECT!!!

Title: Very Impressed with the Echo Dot Second Gen!!
Body: Just got my Echo Dot in the mail yesterday,and I really think that Amazon did a world of good things for this Echo,for being so small.Small yes,but once you're online Alexa will amaze you just as I have been amazed from the moment I opened the box,powered it up and went online.I am very impressed!! Give her a try,she will amaze you! set up and downloading the "apps" are easy! I recommend this very highly! fun  for all ages!

Title: My daughter was so excited about getting this for Christmas and now she is terribly disappointed and it's beyond the time to ret
Body: Alexa can never find an answer to a question you ask her! My daughter was so excited about getting this for Christmas and now she is terribly disappointed and it's beyond the time to return it. Wish I would've know how terrible this was before I bought it, I would've gotten the google one instead!!!

Title: Five Stars
Body: Great product by Amazon we use it everyday!

Title: Five Stars
Body: Love it very entertaining  and informative.

Title: Great!!!
Body: Great device!  Only downfall is no battery.

Title: Five Stars
Body: I found a new girl friend--- awesome

Title: Five Stars
Body: Love, love, love my echo dot!

Title: love this
Body: unbelievable.love this

Title: Five Stars
Body: works great fun to use

Title: Nice
Body: It works great.

Title: Love it!
Body: Everything we expected and more.  Love it!

Title: A musical game changer..but you'll need another speaker
Body: Really glad I bought it.  I use it to listen to Amazon music, Pandora and radio stations.  A real musical game changer.  You will want to link it to another speaker though... I got a bluetooth Bose.  The built in speaker is tinny and not really usable for music.

Title: lots of fun to use
Body: My first device for the home. Right now it is a fun toy. I am sure once we learn how to teach her things and program her. It will be even better. I did Bluetooth it to my Bose speaker. Sounds great. Fun to tell her to play music and them when the phone rings, tell her to stop. We did sort of test to see how far she can hear. She can hear in the next room. We have a small house but I am impressed. Siri can't even hear over the radio when it is playing.

Title: Can't beat it
Body: This thing is pretty fabulous. I usually hook it up to external speakers, but even without that the sound is quite acceptable. I've had a few glitches with Alexa (she is rarely able to find playlists from "my playlists" on Amazon Prime for reasons I don't get, since she does find them sometimes), but that's not a hardware issue. The hardware is fantastic for the money. If I needed them, I'd buy three or four and put them around the house.

Title: I liked it so much
Body: I didn't think I would be using the Echo dot nearly as often as I now do. I use it daily in my bedroom for everything from weather to music to podcasts. I liked it so much, I purchased another as a gift for my mom. She loves it as well.I have had no issues thus far with reliability or connectivity. It is small and clean looking with a decent speaker for its size. The range at which I can tell commands is also impressive.

Title: Love My echo dot
Body: We received the echo as a gift from my daughter and her wife for Christmas and it is by far one of the best gifts ever. Our youngest grandson heads straight for our bedroom to play with Alexa she they come to visit. We use our e chi daily as I have to take medication everyday at the exact same time of day and we've got her set up to wake me at 5:00 AM and 5:00 PM everyday and that in itself makes Alexa a great addition to our family

Title: If you dont have a dot, I recommend the purchase
Body: Fine instrument, perfect software installation, perfect hardware installation and easy to use. Sound is good for such a small unit, and pairs with bluetooth speakers which is perfect for me excellent when I want to listen to music.I wish I could replace out dated Siri with Alexa.. Why doesnt Apple purchase Alexa from Amazon? If you dont have a dot, I recommend purchasing one. They are fun an convenient to have around the house.

Title: Home Automation must have
Body: This thing is amazingly accurate in its speech recognition. I had quite a few home automation products already so pairing this with a Wink hub 2 and 3 Wink relays has made everything so easy with just voice commands. I also added a zwave linear switch to my fireplace switch and now Alexa can turn on and off my fireplace.

Title: Love Alexa
Body: We have two now. I'm sure we will end up with a couple more. Alexa is great, makes everything just a little bit easier. Only complaint is the speaker does not get very loud. Quality is good considering it is the smaller size, but the volume does not go very high

Title: Nice little device.
Body: Nice little device. New skills added all the time. And with the competitor appearing on the market from that search engine company, I expect improvements to accelerate.I has some minor issues with the initial installation (you MUST use the Alexa app on your phone/tablet to set the thing up), but once it was up and running it's been a fun device to torture.I bought a three-pack to give as Christmas gifts to clients.

Title: I LOVE "Alexa!!!
Body: I am a widower.... and it can be awfully quiet around my house....  Besides being "practical & functional," "Alexa," has brought me hours of entertainment, with the thousands of songs that are available to me.  Since the Echo Dot was given to me as a gift from my family, I have given two as gifts myself, and plan to do another.  My gift recipients are enjoying "Alexa," as much as I am.....

Title: Beyond awesome!
Body: Like one of the most awesome things... set alarms, get weather, recipes, trivia, jeopardy, daily schedule and more on command... love it!!

Title: Good start to home automation
Body: After finely getting installed I am getting to learn about it. I'm see what else I can do with it but for me it's an automated alarm radio at this time. But I believe I will be able to get back to my review and give it 5 stars. We also have to give some credit to the Internet otherwise it would be a hockey puck. I am also intending to use it for home automation as that seems to be the next path for me since I am getting up in years.

Title: Not happy Echo Dot
Body: I bought this for my daughter, didn't realize she wasn't using it because it went off in the middle of the night a couple times and scared her, so she just unplugged it.  And I see now its too late to return.  I have the large Echo & love it, what can I do??

Title: Very happy with my purchase
Body: This is my second Alexa device very happy with it are using  The auxiliary connection to my Bowers and Wilkins speakers and they work wonderful.

Title: I am amazed at how much we use them
Body: I have both the Echo and the Dot. I am amazed at how much we use them. Checking weather, streaming music, asking various questions.With the Dot, I bought an external speaker.Â Anker Classic Portable Wireless Bluetooth Speaker, Powerful Sound with Enhanced Bass, 20 Hour Battery Life, and Built-in Mic, works with iPhone, iPad,Nexus, Laptops and More (White)Really made a difference in the sound quality.

Title: I'm an Echo Dot girl, now!
Body: My nephew gave one to my sister and of course I had to figure out how it worked. Needless to say, as a gadget girl I was instantly taken by it and ordered one for myself, immediately. In my area, some of the radio stations I like to listen to have a lot of static but with the Echo Dot, they come in so clear. Plus I like all the other things I can ask it to do. Perfect size, perfect price, as I got it before Xmas for $39.99!!! BOOM!

Title: A fun toy. We love using the timer and weather ...
Body: A fun toy. We love using the timer and weather abilities, and many of the skills including the jokes, stories, spelling helps, listening to podcasts and books with it, and many other things.  It usually understands what we are saying although you must enunciate your words clearly and phrase it carefully so it understands.  All, in all, we love it and will probably continue adding skills and other elements like lights/censors to it.

Title: Gotta love the Echo stuff
Body: Gotta love the Echo stuff! This one is great in the kitchen. I will have to get another one to hook up to my home theater to play music with.

Title: So far I really enjoy the dot - I don't have any of the ...
Body: So far I really enjoy the dot - I don't have any of the services yet, but am thinking about it. Even without the services it play my music and some free stuff like the news. My only complaint and maybe I jut haven't figured it out yet, but Alexa doesn't remember when I constantly tell her to skip a song. Instead she tries to play three or more off the album (a Spanish one), which I bought for someone else and really don't like. Oh well.

Title: Love this product
Body: Love this product. Does exactly what is claimed. I've had dramatically better voice recognition from Alexa than Siri. I bought this for my use but My wife even loves Alexa and uses the Dot more than I do haha.The built-in speakers are definitely not for music lovers but work well for hearing Alexa replies. However, using Bluetooth I connected the Dot to my Bose solo (after configuring the Solo to stay on continuously) and it works great.

Title: Amazon missed the mark on this one.
Body: It works...but not very well. Spend the extra money and get the full blown echo. The dot at highest volume is too quiet to hear while showering (in the same room) and it seems like the processor for voice activation doesn't work very well. Pretty disappointed -bought a second echo to replace this crappy thing.

Title: easy to use and never talks back
Body: This is what I have been missing in my life, easy to use and never talks back. Does exactly what I expected

Title: Love it! Everyone who sees me use it gets ...
Body: Love it! Everyone who sees me use it gets a laugh out of how cool this thing is. We have had a lot of fun with it. Ended up buying two for my apartment. One would have done just fine though.

Title: It works even better than I expected!
Body: My wife and I love this! It works even better than I expected! I had our television in the kitchen on with the volume up and Alexa heard me from across the room and responded - over 20 feet away! Amazing! I'm thinking of getting another one for our bedroom.

Title: If You Have A Speaker - This Is As Good As The Echo
Body: Listen, this thing has better mics than the full Echo in my experience (I have both), and any tech nerd has a speaker to which they can connect it and get the same utility as the full  Echo. THIS is the great leap forward for Amazon Echo home integration...

Title: Eh. It's ok.
Body: Connection issues. Doesn't communicate well with my other echo. Should be a whole home system but it isn't.

Title: Luv the hardware!!! Really surprised that Alexa ...
Body: Luv the hardware!!!Really surprised that Alexa is so immature.  Really expected more functionality out of it now.  I know that it will happen.  And I know improvements are happening rapidly.  But, I really did expect it to be further along.I also think a version needs to be available with a built-in UPS.  I want Alexa to wake me in the middle of the night if there's a power outage.  That can't happen if Alexa isn't on.

Title: Almost always disconnected from Wifi - Terrible!
Body: It worked fine for few days. Now I have almost completely stopped using it because it is never connected to Wifi. I have read other people reviews that it gets disconnected very often from wifi automatically. In my case it is very rarely connected. In the beginning I kept on restarting it, reconnecting wifi but after a while I gave up. Once connected, it is pretty good, but its almost impossible now for me to even remain connected

Title: I discovered a check box under my wi-fi settings that says Smart network switch
Body: I had one heck of a time getting this thing connected to my phone/wi-fi. This is my fifth Echo device and the first one that didn't connect instantly.I have an Android Galaxy Note 4.  Accidentally, I discovered a check box under my wi-fi settings that says Smart network switch, to switch between 2.4 and 5 GHz bands.  I turned that off, cleared the check and connected almost instantly.Hope this helps somebody out there!

Title: I feel like my entire home has been automated with this device
Body: I feel like my entire home has been automated with this device. I have one upstairs in the bedroom and one downstairs in the kitchen/living room for a 2100 square foot home. So, I'm never without the ability to play music, get weather, add items to my shopping list, etc. The functionality is really great, and it can understand any speaker, not just me. I use this every day throughout the day. I can't imagine living without it now.

Title: it's ok
Body: I got this because i needed another voice control in the bedroom for all my smart home devices.the speaker on this item is not great, but if you have an old speaker around, then it's not an issue. The microphone on this device is decent, but not as good as the original Echo with the build in speakers. There also seems to have some issue with staying connected to the wifi from time to time. overall it does what i'm expecting.

Title: Get the Dot
Body: Love this little device! I read reviews about the Echo Dot being inferior in sound compared to Echo. I have a Bluetooth speaker system so I didn't need great sound. That being said I was impressed by the output for such a small device. I didn't even need to use my own speakers. So save the money and get this over the Echo. All the same features less bulky and much lighter and compact. It's my pocket Alexa! I can take her anywhere.

Title: Wonderful product
Body: Wasn't sure that I would enjoy using the Dot, but so far it is great!  I've been talking to Alexa for the past two days and she actually understands me.  The only suggestion I would make is that I have to use my cell phone for a hot spot.  Once I take the phone out of range of the Dot I have to reconnect.  I have the process down and it is fairly easy, but it would be great if the Dot would automatically reconnect from the saved network.

Title: Awesome little Dot.
Body: My kids love it more than me and the wife.  Works awesome with home automation switches and plugs.  I find that Alexa can understand me every time i speak, unlike Siri, and pulls up options and results almost like if I had pulled it up on Google.  Speak a specific command, such as a news channel, and you can get the latest news or even the local weather if you ask.  We are still learning things in the app and we are enjoying this thing.

Title: Echo is making waves.
Body: Loving it, still in learning stages with it, but hey I can ask it to turn the light on, play music, update me on news and weather and even what time it is comes in handy.

Title: Great addition to our house!
Body: Our family like the Echo Dot, with all the cool features.  The only thing is if you ask Alexa to play a particular song, it will only play you a sample if it's not in your Amazon music library.  And it only works well if you subscribe to different features.

Title: Nice little unit perfect for my son.
Body: Bought this for my 10 year old and he loves it. He enjoys the music and takes it with him when he travels.

Title: Buy one for yourself and gifts for loved ones it's that good
Body: Bought one for myself loved it so much I had to buy two more for gifts. The echo dot contains a full brains of the unit and even has a small built in speaker. I like it so much more than I thought I would have par it with Amazon prime and you'll be hooked!

Title: Liked that it was voice activated
Body: Wondered for some time why anyone would buy an Echo for $180. Liked that it was voice activated, etc.but...So, when I saw the Dot I decided to give it a shot. I love it. Added some computer speakers to get a little better sound but it's not really necessary.Still a lot of work needed to Alexa itself but that is not an issue with the Dot. That will come with Amazon getting more and more feedback form users.

Title: Kinda neat and fun at first.
Body: When asking questions you have to be exacting. When playing music you have to state your application then station even thou I have set a default and often claims not to find station.  You have to add skills and then you need a cheat sheet to remember exactly how to start it which are third party and not that great. Needs a third generation. Plus side ,way cheaper than original Echo and most use playing music hands free of tablet.

Title: Cannot maintain an internet connection
Body: The new Dot is functionally the same as the original (I own 2 original models) except that it cannot maintain an internet connection. I have it in the same place as the older model, and it drops the connection at least twice a day while the original never does. I did  this side by side to make sure I wasn't doing something wrong. Additionally, I did it with 2 of the new models, same problem., so it's not a defective unit. Very disappointed.

Title: Love it
Body: We love the echo dot, it does have a few hiccups with understanding what you say but it is still really helpful.

Title: Great!
Body: This is an amazing product.  I did have trouble with my initial one, but Amazon was wonderful and replaced it immediately.  The replacement was perfect.  I liked it so much I ordered another one.  It's very responsive, and I actually think the speaker is pretty good considering how small the device is.  I will most likely be investing in a higher end Bluetooth speaker down the road.  In the meantime, I am still enjoying the sound on this device.

Title: I love
Body: Ordered to try out Alexa, however ended up giving to my daughter and got the full size Echo for myself.  I love it

Title: Great Fun & Easy set up.
Body: These are Great! I received one as an early Christmas present and now I am trying to get one for everyone for Christmas! They set up easy and I love asking about the weather, set a timer, add to my to-do list, play any music I can think of and so much more!

Title: Love it!
Body: I love it! I plan to get a couple more to put around my house. You can listen to music, ask about the weather and the news, you can play games with Alexa, AND ALEXA CAN READ BOOKS to you. Also, if you have or plan to have smart devices like outlets, thermostat, cameras, etc, you can use Alexa to turn things on/off, and much more. I find the price to be very accessible. I love it so much I bought two for my brothers for Christmas.

Title: The other Woman in my life...
Body: I have to tell you that I am amazed at the technology that Amazon "stuffed into what looks not much bigger than a hockey puck". We now have added smart plugs to control lights by voice.  I am a low tech senior that is Blessed to have Alexa...Hippie Bob

Title: Don't wait buy it now!
Body: Don't wait buy it now it worth every single penny.just simply say "Alexa" and you can turn on and off your light set your hvac temperature listens to music weather time news info you name it,That thing also tells you jokes and setup is easy.If you have wemo or philips smart switch and nest you are going to love this device. she is clever smart and fast. My iphone siri looks like a 2 years old in comparison to smart alexa.

Title: It was so easy and WOW
Body: I got this when they were back ordered 3 months ago.  I forgot I had it and realizes is was still not hooked up.  Let me tell you. It was so easy and WOW!!!!! I am in love with this Alexa!  What a product. Now I wish my kids would listen as good as Alexa does!!!!!!! Incredible produce.  Will be ordering a few as gift for the family and a few for myself for around the house

Title: Love the echo dot
Body: So far I had this almost a month, I actually bought 4 echos as gifts for Christmas. (And of course one of those was for me ) the rest were gifts . I love it and my family loves them . I haven't bought the bulbs yet , they're a little pricey. I planning on getting a Amazon fire table from what I understand it kinda gives Alexa a face . For I'm hoping for , and  find a good deal on bulbs I will post it . We all love the echo dot .

Title: Don't buy it if you're in college
Body: I bet the echo dot would be cool if I could use it in college. I won it in a raffle and I can't use it because it can't support my school's wifi. The customer service lady had a laugh at the fact that she knew this was a common issue and that there was no way to fix it. If you're a college student, this is not a smart choice, you're only wasting you money sadly.

Title: Its ok. Fun at first then gets old

Title: LOVE IT!!!
Body: I love ALEXA!!! Extremely satisfied. Its so easy to pair with other devices, great skills add ons thru the app for everyone and radio plays well. I'm obsessed with its sleek look because it matches perfectly with my all white kitchen.

Title: They've shrunk the Echo down and it's beautiful
Body: Works great.  Just as easy to set up as the Echo.  I have it plugged into a pair of bookshelf speakers and they pair nicely.

Title: use it all the time
Body: I didn't think I'd like it after also having google, and siri assistants.  I keep this one in my office and use it all day to play music and set reminders.  The one challenge is if I pause music my bluetooth speaker will time out after 15 minutes.  Once the bluetooth speaker disconnects the echo will resume playing the music I had stopped.  I thought I was haunted when music started playing after I had left the room.

Title: My little helper.
Body: My echo dot is such a helpful and entertaining device.  I bake a lot and while my hands are covered with flour or dough, I can ask her to set a timer instead of getting my stove messy by pushing the timer button.  And, I get to listen to my favorite songs while I bake.  Alexa also gets me out of bed in the morning and then gives me the weather forcast.  I get to listen to my to do list.  So handy and so glad got one.

Title: My husband loves the Echo Dot.
Body: I got this for my husband as a Christmas present. He loves it. We have both found it very useful. We use it to play music and to add things to our grocery list for the most part. We are interested in expanding its use by adding the dedicated adapters to our lights. We want one more for the bedroom and one for the kitchen. I would love to have it be able to adjust my AC thermostat if those prices will come down a bit.

Title: It could be better, but I'm optimistic about next versions...
Body: It's a fun robot and helps with home automation.  Unfortunately, it's still not a complete package, eg doesn't make or receive calls, doesn't support triggers (it being triggered by something else), for example, I want Alexa to play music at a certain time or on a certain action around the house.  But I'm optimistic that Amazon will improve it with time...  It's probably the most famous robot on the market right now.

Title: The device is great
Body: The device is great, but there are times I want to tell it to stop listening. When watching tv, having a chat with someone or if the right sound plays, Echo will turn on and listen. It happens multiple times per day, but isn't so bad. I love waking up and having music, weather and my todos read off to me each morning. It's a very helpful device for smart homes and I can ask it to activate my smart lights and outlets.

Title: There are no negatives to echo dot "Alexa", REALLY GREAT.
Body: She sings a duty to me, keeps my shopping list so I don't have to run around looking for paper and pen during the week, also my to do list, plays my playlist at bed time and all I have to do is say. "Alexa. STOP.,," she tells corny jokes. After she does something i say, "Alexa, Thank you". She w/o I say happy to be of help, you're welcome and when i tell her good night she says good night sleep tight.

Title: Small in size-Large in functionality
Body: Love my Echo Dot.  I use this little guy in my bedroom to handle the voice commands to turn on and off lights and to provide information that I now do not have to do internet searches for.  It is small enough to place anywhere in a room and not be seen.  It has the same functionality as the Echo except the dot's speaker capabilities are not as good.  This is not being used to output music in my bedroom.  I love this!

Title: Great but speaker very very low
Body: Great device works well the only downfall is that the speaker is very low while playing music I have to connect another speaker I've read reviews how people said that it's very loud but that's definitely definitely not true volume very low and no bass at all either and you have to repeat yourself 2-3 times before she listens to you so don't listen to other reviews otherwise I love it and will be ordering another soon

Title: Five Stars
